imdb.plot outline: In order to make money to my grandpa doctor, grandmother came to Shenzhen with a tiger, was indeed encountered a robbery, did not expect the robbers were subdued under the tiger, happened to be met by female reporter Mei Mei, so the ancestral and grandchildren had Interest, and help the tiger solve the problem of going to school. Tiger's grandmother in a martial arts to do cleaning work, free-laden tiger saw martial arts in Taekwondo children are very envious of. Whenever the students after class, the tiger alone in the martial arts gym practice. Wang coach saw, and received the tiger to be apprentice. Wang trainer's son Wang Duan also learn in this Taekwondo tube, the tiger is very unconvinced, the two began to contest, the tiger to win. Meimei in the martial arts hall inadvertently met her father Liu Yunlu lost for many years, the original Liu Yunlu Wang coach is the master, after a contest with the tiger, Liu Yunlu think tiger is a nurturing seedlings, resolutely decided to take the tiger to Hong Kong Training. Meimei also agreed with her father, when parting, Meimei asked her father to find her mother.
imdb.title: Kung Fu Boy
plot: Mei Mei use Takewondo to find her mother while Lingling wants to prove he can be the best.::Youku.com
